title: Agentic Coding Frontier
subtitle: Bleeding-Edge AI Agents and Autonomous Software Workflows
description: A practical deep dive into the frontier of AI agents, multi-agent systems, and agentic coding techniques. Learn how elite teams design, evaluate, and scale autonomous development workflows from idea to production.
author: Alex & Riley
